original_text: “Concerning this house that you are building, if you will walk in my statutes and obey my rules and keep all my commandments and walk in them, then I will establish my word with you, which I spoke to David your father.
korean_text: 네가 지금 이 성전을 건축하니 네가 만일 내 법도를 따르며 내 율례를 행하며 내 모든 계명을 지켜 그대로 행하면 내가 네 아버지 다윗에게 한 말을 네게 확실히 이룰 것이요

sentences.original_text: Concerning this house that you are building
if you will walk in my statutes
then I will establish my word with you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너와 함께 나의 말을 세울 것이요

sentences.original_text: which I spoke to David your father
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 네 아버지 다윗에게 말한 것을
